content: > the written instructions for this scarf ** are available for free on my blog 1 ** the downloadable pattern listed here for sale includes written instructions and a handy chart with x s indicating the front post extended stitches for easy reference **facebook group** i have a facebook group where i provide support for all my patterns - join the group 2 **about the pattern** when i began learning and trying out mosaic crochet one of my first projects was crafting a scarf and i found the repetitive pattern so fun to make it s a cozy accessory in the colors i chose and it only required weaving in four ends the yarn i used has been discontinued but there are plenty of alternative options available this design can shine with various gradient or solid color combinations **skill level** easy - the pattern expects basic knowledge of starting and ending a tunisian crochet project and how to make the two stitches used in tunisian mosaic crochet **sharing on social media** if you decide to share your projects on social media i would love to see them please tag your posts with ** @knitterknotter 5 #knitterknotter 6 #madewithknitterknotter 7 ** **blog** you can find all my patterns on my blog here https //knitterknotter com/patterns/ please do not copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell finished items but please credit the pattern to me arunima goel @ knitterknotter i will be happy to see your finished product s join my facebook group to share pictures of your work and to get any help you might need https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ you can follow me on my blog to get updates on new patterns https //knitterknotter com **discounts** you can always find the following discounts in my shop buy 2 patterns and get 10% off add 2 patterns to your cart buy 3 patterns and get 15% off add 3 patterns to your cart buy 4 patterns and get 1 pattern of value up to $5 free add 5 patterns to your cart and the one with the lowest price will be free > this is a pattern only and not a completed item 1 https //knitterknotter com 2 https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ 3 https //knitterknotter com/tunisian-crochet-tutorial-tunisian-knit-stitch/ 4 https //knitterknotter com/tunisian-crochet-tutorial-reverse-stitch-trs/ 5 https //www instagram com/knitterknotter/ 6 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/knitterknotter/ 7 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/madewithknitterknotter/
